properties.Name: CustomerCollectionAgencyReferral
properties.Description: A referral of unpaid customer debts (Invoices) to a third-party, Collection Agency, for settlement or resolution.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: CreditCollectionAgencyPartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: DateReferred
Columns.Description: The date that the Customer account was referred to the Collection Agency.

Columns.Name: ReferredAmount
Columns.Description: The amount referred to the Collection Agency for collection.

Columns.Name: CollectedAmount
Columns.Description: The amount collected by the Collection Agency.

Columns.Name: CreditCollectionAgencyFee
Columns.Description: The fee paid to the Collection Agency for their efforts.

Columns.Name: CreditCollectionAgencyPercentage
Columns.Description: The percentage paid to the Collection Agency for their efforts.

Columns.Name: CreditReferralStatusId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the Credit Referral Status.

Columns.Name: ReferralNote
Columns.Description: Notes, comments or additional information regarding the referral.
